attributes.action: ban the import of all tropical hardwood into the UK and all Soya from Brazil and to persuade the EU to do the same. We respectfully request him to apologise for 10 years of major contribution to massive rainforest destruction by his inaction to date.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The EU imports 50% of the Soya from Brazil, which is grown on land that was rain forest. The UK and EEC are huge importers of tropical hardwood from around the world often as finished products fenced through intermediate countries especially China who allow import of illegal timber. Without demand the pressure to destroy these forests may reduce.
The destruction of tropical rain forest is genocide of a huge percentage of life on earth, what will history think of your inaction Mr Blair once all this life is gone (along with the hardwood...........).
